alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 11:54PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nuckolls and northeastern Webster Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1153 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Lawrence, or 28 miles south of Hastings, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nelson and Nora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
